turns.content: How many artists and performance pieces are usually selected for each season?

As an AI language model, I still don't have enough context about the local theater company you are referring to. Each theater company has its own programming and selection process. I hope you find the information you're looking for. Don't hesitate to ask if you have any other questions!
I'm excited to learn more about the theater company and their selection process.
I'm glad I could help. Have fun exploring and learning more about the theater company. If you have any other questions or concerns, don't hesitate to come back and ask!
I just checked their website and found out they have a pretty diverse selection of plays and musicals each season. I'm thinking of auditioning for one of them.
